# Prerequisites
You require a free account for Tercen to perform the tutorials contained within this book.

Please sign up on the main Tercen website http://www.tercen.com

<center>![](images/tercen-book.png)</center>

## Why read this book
Can we get researchers empowered and back in control of their data?. Read the book to find out. This is essentially a Tercen manual.

## Structure of the book
There are getting started guides (Chapter 2 and Chapter 3) as well as more in-depth explanations.

## Acknowledgement
I would like to thank all the users of Tercen and also those who have given feedback, all of which made Tercen possible.
